definition: female of any member of the dog family, to say mean things
details:
noun
- female of any member of the dog family
- informal terms for objecting
= example: informal terms for objecting
= synonyms: kick
- a person, usually but not necessarily a woman, who is thoroughly disliked
= example: a person, usually but not necessarily a woman, who is thoroughly disliked
- an unpleasant difficulty
= example: an unpleasant difficulty
verb
- to say mean things
= example: to say mean things
= synonyms: backbite
- to complain
= example: to complain
= synonyms: crab
